name: † Facebook Remove All Clutter + Right Sidebar †
description:
Removes advertisements on Facebook.
Removes the right sidebar (because it's filled with so much unnecessary stuff), "Your Games" and "Suggested Games" in the chat sidebar, as well as the sidebar sections Apps, Interests, Developer, and Events.
HD Preview
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
Previously known as unholymaster, my last account was banned, so I'm reposting all of my styles. Request advertisement removing scripts for certain websites here.

user.name: AdaleighFaith
user.about: I mostly create styles to remove ads on websites and dark themes for the websites that I visit the most due to Irlen Syndrome and sensitivity to bright colours. Request style: https://form.jotform.co/61763045059861 ________________________________________________________________________________ For my sets I use the following: Backgrounds - #000000/black Secondary backgrounds (sidebars) - #0a0a0a or #181717/dark grey Text - #444444 or #a2a0a0/medium grey Links - #9043cc/dark purple Links hover - #be7fef/light purple ________________________________________________________________________________ Midnight Set † Midnight | Userstyles Dark Theme † ________________________________________________________________________________ Advertisement Removers *NO LONGER MAINTAINED | † Userstyles Advertisement Remover † *NO LONGER MAINTAINED | † Pixlr Advertisement Remover † † Pastebin Advertisement Remover † † MeetMe Advertisement Remover † † FriendProject Advertisement Remover † † eBay Advertisement Remover † † AdF.ly Advertisement Remover †

additional_info: Version 2.5 Change Log: Unknown date // Tidied up coding, currently working on fixing missing years in profile/activity log and removing sponsored posts. 08/08/2015 // Added coding to remove "Donate" popups on news feed. 08/05/2016 // Reposted on new account. 27/05/2016 // Added coding to remove new header above status bar on news feed. 28/05/2016 // Added coding to remove new footer below friends list on profiles. 05/06/2016 // Fixed coding error causing information not to show up on groups. 11/06/2016 // Tidied up coding. 05/09/2016 // Fixed bug causing post column on groups to be off screen due to an update in Facebook's coding. 11/02/2017 // Minor fixes. 12/02/2017 // Added coding to remove "Nearby" section from chat sidebar. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and updated credit to new username. 13/09/2017 // Added coding to remove new businesses section from chat sidebar and "People You May Know" section from your profile. 17/08/2018 // Added coding to remove new sections "Stories", "Your Pages", "Your Games", and "Recommended for You Nearby".
